HPI 8086 Nissan Skyline GT-R (R32) 1991 JTC Series 3rd/4th Place K. Hoshino/T. Suzuki



Kazuyoshi Hoshini & Toshio Suzuki earned the number one on this car by winning the 1990 JTC series. 1991 got off to a great start with securing the pole position and the win in round 1 - the Sugo 300km. Round 2 - the Suzuka Super Touring Car 500 km - started off the same way with another pole position but they retired after about 350km. This proved to be a setback they would not be able to recover from. Despite securing pole positions in every round of the series, 2 more wins, a 2nd place, & a 3rd place finish, they finished 26 points behind the Skyline of Masahiro Hasemi & Anders Olofsson.
